page.title: 19STOURBRIDGE ENVIRONMENT
page.content: {Stourbridge}is a town situated on the western edge of the metropolitan county of the{West Midlands}. It is very close to the rural counties of Staffordshire and Hereford and Worcester. Stourbridge, herefore, lies on a{rural/urban fringe . In a Survey of housing type and age in Stourbridge, 81% of people who were interviewed lived in detached and semi-detached houses and 19% terraced houses or flats. 70% of people who were interviewed lived in dwellings less than 40 years old (post-war) and 30% in older dwellings. This data supports the theory that larger and newer dwellings are found on a rural/urban fringe. In a survey of preferences of urban or rural living, 87% of people said they preferred to live in a rural environment and 13% in an urban environment.
